Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in com.hazelcast:hazelcast.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 4.0.0 before 4.0.5, all versions starting from 4.1.1 before 4.1.8, all versions starting from 4.2 before 4.2.4, all versions starting from 5.0 before 5.0.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 4.0.0, all versions starting from 4.0.5 before 4.1.1, all versions starting from 4.1.8 before 4.2, all versions starting from 4.2.4 before 5.0, all versions starting from 5.0.2.
